titles.title: Miscellaneous Tariff Bill Act of 2017
Miscellaneous Tariff Bill Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify temporarily certain rates of duty.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Miscellaneous Tariff Bill Act of 2017
This bill amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States (HTS) to: (1) repeal expired reductions in rates of duty for specified chemicals and other items; and (2) provide for duty suspensions and reductions through December 31, 2020, for specified chemicals and other items.
